definition: to read a sample chapter of a book/to subscribe to a publication on a trial basis/to attend classes on a trial basis
to test/to try/experiment/examination/test
comma/phrase marked by pause
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

sentences.english: This fee must be paid before the trial and it is not refundable.
sentences.chinese: 試讀費在試讀前支付，若不滿一週離園，則不退還。

sentences.english: This fee must be paid before the trial and it is not refundable.
sentences.chinese: 試讀費在試讀前支付，若不滿一週離園，則不退還。

sentences.english: Language is a tool in the exchange to human ideas.
sentences.chinese: 部分試讀語言是人們交流思想的工具。

sentences.english: Why doesn't she try another school for a year and then transfer?
sentences.chinese: 爲何她不試讀別的學校一年，然後再轉學？
我真不想起牀淘寶登陸，聽聽試讀。
